p: In the District Court of the 4th Judicial District of Washington Territory holding terms at Cheney Territory of Washington, Plaintiff vs Wilson D. Coyle, Defendant}motion for continuance Indicted for assault with intent to commit murder " Now on the 20th day of April A.D. 1885, comes the above named defendant for his attorneys. Frank P. Houghton and W.H. Smallwood and move the court for a con- tinuance in the above entitled cause upon the named applicant in the affidavit to thereto attached. Wilson D. Coyle By Frank P. Houghton and W.H. Smallwood Attys for Defendant
